data.title: I/O Galore
data.description: With 5 retractable I/O devices, plus a "start" button, there's plenty of room for creative puzzle expression.

data.title: Extensible
data.description: The documented API makes writing your own puzzles a breeze.

data.title: Modular
data.description: Each I/O device communicates over a standard protocol, so you can swap them out and even add your own.

data.title: Open Source
data.description: It wouldn't be truly extensible if it weren't 100% open-source.
